Create a puzzle game where the player takes on the role of an octopus with only seven arms and must use strategy to overcome obstacles and complete challenges.
Write a short story about a fictional octopus who loses one of its arms and must learn to adapt and survive in a world with fewer limbs.
Design a new type of sea creature that is similar to an octopus but has only seven arms. This creature could have unique abilities or characteristics that set it apart from traditional octopuses.

Create a series of illustrations or animations that depict theus of an octopus with only seven arms. These could be used as educational materials or as a fun way to teach children about the diversity of marine life.
Write a poem or song about an octopus with only seven arms. The lyrics could explore themes of perseverance, adaptation, and the beauty of difference.
